thread.section_title: L'Ouest Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location
thread.title_full: Fantastic location - Review of L'Ouest Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sefora F
title: Fantastic location
text:
Great location! Situated in the 8th arrondissement, the location is very convenient - Gare Sain-Lazare train station is just across the street, so it is very easy to travel. The neighbourhood is also lovely - fantastic cafe open 24/7 just next door and Starbucks round the corner. The room was rather small, however still comfortable. Couldn't ask for anything more - very comfortable bed and bathroom was fantastic - quite large. Also, it had very good heating. Staff were also very welcoming and helpful.
Room Tip: Excellent location See more room tips
